title: CafePress World's Greatest Farter I Mean Father Apron (Dar Kitchen Apron with Pockets, Grilling Apron, Baking Apron
features: NOW YOU'RE COOKING: Take your kitchen game to the next level with an apron that shows off your unique personality. Whether you're manning the barbecue or baking for the kiddos, this apron will protect your clothes from messes while delivering smiles.
FUN AND FASHIONABLE: One size fits all! Our high-quality kitchen apron measures 31" long by 29" wide and is the perfect choice for you or your favorite chef.
PROFESSIONALLY PRINTED: Expertly printed with vivid designs using premium inks that resist fading. Imported for final manufacture locally

MADE TO LAST: Our classic apron is made from 100% heavy cotton twill and features two large pockets and a drawstring tie at the waist. To care for your apron, machine wash cold with like colors and tumble dry low.

IDEAL FOR YOURSELF & A UNIQUE GIFT: Surprise your spouse, child, parent, grandparent or friend, or order one just for you! Our aprons make a unique and thoughtful gift for Christmas, birthdays, Mother's Day and Father's Day, or just because!
description: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Spice up conversations in the kitchen or around the barbeque with this durable and unique kitchen apron. Ideal for cooking, baking, grilling, or bartending, it's perfect for foodies of all sizes. This quality cooking apron is 100% heavy cotton twill, with a drawstring waist and two large front pockets to hold your BBQ supplies. Give this chef apron as a housewarming gift, or for Father's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, or birthdays, and they'll always think of you with every use. And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges.
